title: LF Promo Help/Team (Currently Unranked)
body: Hey, haven't played much ranked. First time I got ranked was last season in B1 but I want to strive for higher and higher. I am looking for a duo partner to get our of promos and a team if possible. Hit me up. IGN: PixelPie

replies.body: Hey bro, I'm currently in B2 and just flailing with all the shitty toxic team mates. My acc is IMPxADES just add me and send a message and lets duo.
Hey dude do you remember derpingallgame? becausei think i have you in my friends
